name: Gambit Aviation
about: Gambit Aviation, located at Aurora Municipal Airport, offers a unique and comprehensive flight training experience. Led by Master Certified Flight Instructor-Aerobatic Jared Sebesta, the school provides private, instrument, and commercial pilot certifications, as well as specialized training in aerobatics, upset recovery, tailwheel endorsements, and more. With a diverse team of instructors and a fleet including the Extra 330LX, T-6 Texan, and Pitts S2B, Gambit Aviation emphasizes personalized, hands-on training to build confidence and versatility in pilots. The school is committed to providing a safe, enjoyable, and low-stress learning environment, making aviation accessible to all passionate about flight. Gambit Aviation invites aspiring pilots to embark on a transformative flight journey.
